name: Interact with the Hall of Heroes Door

nodes.text: The handle of this door is sticky.
I can also see a sticky streak next to the door and on the floor underneath the handle.
Yikes! You don't suppose that the sticky stuff is blood!
(sniff) That's a relief. It smells more like ripe apple than blood. I guess the lack of color would be another clue that it wasn't blood. What can I say? It's late at night.
The plaque says that this is "Big D's Hall of Heroes."
Maybe I can catch the sound of the Thief in here...
I can hear a weird click and a sliding sound!
I can hear a click and a sliding sound! Someone else must know about the secret passage!

nodes.message: TODO: The Kwirk could be here for an event.

nodes.text: Maybe I can hear something now...
I hear a furtive, furry, rustling sound. There's something moving in there!
I guess no one's in the Hall of Heroes right now.
With Terk snooping around, this is probably not a good time to practice my listening skills.
Let's see if I can hear anything now.
Someone's coming... I'd better get out of here.
I think that I hear footsteps... They sound really close!
Conner! It's past curfew. Five demerits - and go to your room!
I really need to work on my perception skills - and figure out that Terk was still wandering around so I don't get caught.
I wonder if I can hear anything now...
There's something moving in there, but it's really quiet.
I guess no one's in the Hall of Heroes right now.
